name: It's Elementary! Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text:
As an example, the clue "Element found in the human skull" would lead to "cranium."

Are you ready?

Element used to construct indoor sporting facilities.
Intel uses this element to make its computer chips.
Element that is used to make lecterns.
Element found in a one-celled life form with no nucleus.
Element essential for growing flowering houseplants with heart-shaped, often fragrant leaves and flowers in shades of pink or red.
Element used in multi-unit, privately owned dwellings.
Element given as payment for a speech.
